mobs.long_desc: The Undead Lord floats here staring at you with contempt.
mobs.desc: You are looking at the undead Lord of the mausoleum.  It seems that at one time he was buried here, and has chosen to spend his afterlife in this room. He looks disturbed somehow, but you would rather not know why.  A deep light glows from his eyes, and as you look at him, he seems to concentrating on you intensely.

mobs.long_desc: A moaning zombie shambles towards you.
mobs.desc: This shambling creature moans in fury and agony as it lurches toward its victims. Flesh rots right off of it, but it doesn't seem to notice that some of its bones are exposed. Despite this, the aura of menace and power around the creature is unmistakable.

mobs.long_desc: An undead form of a man with ripped clothing stands here drooling.
mobs.desc: Somewhat a zombie, but more disgusting in appearance, this creature feeds on flesh. Blood, dried and crusted, covers the lower half of what was once its face, with its rotted-away nose and dribbling eyesockets. The flesh covering its bones is worm-eaten, but mostly whole.

mobs.long_desc: A deadly wight stands here wanting to rip you apart.
mobs.desc: This insane-looking, gibbering creature might once have been human, but now its status is undiscernible. Its fingers are arched into claws, and the claws are yellowed and cracking, but sharp. The teeth are filed into points, and they, too, are not in good shape. The creature's eyes, once human, are now utterly mad.

mobs.long_desc: A deadly wraith grins evilly as he lurches towards you.
mobs.desc: This wraith is an evil undead spirit of a powerful human that seeks to eat the life right out of you.  He is definitely not an easy opponent!

mobs.long_desc: A death knight stands here on guard.
mobs.desc: The death knight is the horrifying corruption of a Knight of Honor, cursed by the gods to his terrible form as a punishment for betraying the code of honor he held in his former life.  He is quite a formidable foe, and will definitely hold his own in battle.

mobs.long_desc: A Dracolich towers over you with acid dripping from its fangs.
mobs.desc: This is an undead dragon from the old days.  It has acid dripping from its fangs, and towers over you with a height of 15 feet.  Its claws are clenched in anger and wants your blood.

mobs.long_desc: A restless haunt shambles around looking for something to eat.
mobs.desc: You are looking at a restless spirit of a person who died leaving some important task undone.  It seems to be searching for something, and nothing is going to get in its way.

mobs.long_desc: An evil heucuva reaches out to grab you.
mobs.desc: You are looking at an undead spirit similar to that of a skeleton, but much more dangerous.  It is robed in ragged garments, and reeks of rotting flesh.

mobs.long_desc: An evil necromancer is standing here muttering powerful incantations.
mobs.desc: As you look at this evil being, you wonder if it was wise to come here.  It seems as if this creature has been here for quite a long time, and is getting restless.  Kryzanthor is single-handedly responsible for the creation of the tunnel system, and the chaotic state of the graveyard.

mobs.long_desc: An evil banshee stands here ready to rip any body part off she can.
mobs.desc: You are staring at the spirit of an evil female elf who seems to have died at a young age. She still seems to have her youth and vigor, but the anger within reflects that of one who seeks to harm anyone that messes with her.

mobs.long_desc: A Spectre floats here watching you closely.
mobs.desc: A spirit floats here, simmering with righteous indignation.  It doesn't seem to take much notice of things going on around it, preferring instead to search endlessly for something.

mobs.long_desc: A wandering revenant moans painfully.
mobs.desc: A shuffling gait and unfocused eyes mark this mindless zombie-like creature. Once human, it seems to seek, in every face it meets, some sort of clue or information that it cannot find. The eyes are sunken and dull, but blaze with unnatural intensity.

mobs.long_desc: The Undead Caretaker floats here mourning over his death.
mobs.desc: He floats, keening and wailing, sorrowing for things long ago dead. His features are impossible to discern, so misty and ethereal is his form.

mobs.long_desc: A Crimson Death rushes towards you.
mobs.desc: You look upon this horrible creature and sense great power.  This is a malevolent, vaporous creature that feeds on the bodily fluids of its victims. It is in the shape of cloud, and has a pale color.  It resembles a humanoid.

mobs.long_desc: A Necrophidius Snake moves towards you quickly.
mobs.desc: You are looking at an animated creature in the shape of a snake.  It is fully skeletal.  It is also known as the "death worm", and was created for the sole purpose of assassination.  Its head is in the shape of a fanged human skull, and has constantly swirling milky white eyes.  It moves along the ground silently with a macabre grace.

mobs.long_desc: A Bone Guard stands here with a menacing look on his face.
mobs.desc: This skeletal guard seems to have been put here by the necromancer to guard the western sector of the graveyard.  He is seven feet in height, and has a strange light coming from his eyes.  He will not let you pass while he is still standing.

mobs.long_desc: A Dark Thing moves in the shadows.
mobs.desc: As you look at this thing, you have trouble perceiving its shape or size. It is devoid of light, and it seems to suck all light in like a black hole. The Dark Thing likes to hide in the shadows and attack unsuspecting prey at will.

mobs.long_desc: The Caretaker's Undead Dog is sitting here panting.
mobs.desc: You are looking at Scruffy, the caretaker's dog.  He seems to have been killed off by the necromancer too when he killed his master.  Scruffy is a good natured dog that wants to be petted.  At one time, he could have played the part of Lassie, because that's exactly what he looks like.

mobs.long_desc: A deadly wight stands here ready to rip you apart.
mobs.desc: This monster is deadly in combat, and quite fierce.  Its claws stick out in a menacing manner, and it looks upon you as fresh meat.  You hope that this one already had dinner, but you wouldn't bet on it.

mobs.long_desc: A deadly wraith grins evilly as he lurches towards you.
mobs.desc: This wraith is an evil undead spirit of a powerful human that seeks to eat the life right out of you.  He is definitely not an easy opponent!

mobs.long_desc: A Dracolich towers over you with acid dripping from its fangs.
mobs.desc: This is an undead dragon from the old days.  It has acid dripping from its fangs, and towers over you with a height of 15 feet.  Its claws are clenched in anger and wants your blood.

mobs.long_desc: An evil heucuva reaches out to grab you.
mobs.desc: You are looking at an undead spirit similar to that of a skeleton, but much more dangerous.  It is robed in ragged garments, and reeks of rotting flesh.

mobs.long_desc: A deadly wight stands here wanting to rip you apart.
mobs.desc: This monster is deadly in combat, and quite fierce.  Its claws stick out in a menacing manner, and it looks upon you as fresh meat.  You hope that this one already had dinner, but you wouldn't bet on it.

mobs.long_desc: A deadly wraith grins evilly as he lurches towards you.
mobs.desc: This wraith is an evil undead spirit of a powerful human that seeks to eat the life right out of you.  He is definitely not an easy opponent!

mobs.long_desc: A Dracolich towers over you with acid dripping from its fangs.
mobs.desc: This is an undead dragon from the old days.  It has acid dripping from its fangs, and towers over you with a height of 15 feet.  Its claws are clenched in anger and wants your blood.

mobs.long_desc: An evil heucuva reaches out to grab you.
mobs.desc: You are looking at an undead spirit similar to that of a skeleton, but much more dangerous.  It is robed in ragged garments, and reeks of rotting flesh.

mobs.long_desc: A Necrophidius Snake moves towards you quickly.
mobs.desc: You are looking an animated creature in the shape of a snake.  It is fully skeletal.  It is also known as the "death worm", and was created for the sole purpose of assassination.  Its head is in the shape of a fanged human skull, and has constantly swirling milky white eyes.  It moves along the ground silently with a macabre grace.

mobs.long_desc: The Spectre's Wife floats here awaiting her husband.
mobs.desc: This is the wife of the mighty spectre.  Her beauty is undaunted despite her age, and you can understand why the spectre has protected her in such a way.  Just as the spectre, she is a mighty force in battle.

mobs.long_desc: A Crimson Death rushes towards you.
mobs.desc: You look upon this horrible creature and sense great power.  This is a malevolent, vaporous creature that feeds on the bodily fluids of its victims. It is in the shape of cloud, and has a pale color.  It resembles a humanoid.

mobs.long_desc: A Dark Thing moves in the shadows.
mobs.desc: As you look at this thing, you have trouble perceiving its shape or size.  It is devoid of light, and it seems to suck all light in like a black hole.  The Dark Thing likes to hide in the shadows and attack unsuspecting prey at will.

mobs.long_desc: A Dark Thing moves in the shadows.
mobs.desc: As you look at this thing, you have trouble perceiving its shape or size. It is devoid of light, and it seems to suck all light in like a black hole. The Dark Thing likes to hide in the shadows and attack unsuspecting prey at will.

mobs.long_desc: A Dark Thing moves in the shadows.
mobs.desc: As you look at this thing, you have trouble perceiving its shape or size. It is devoid of light, and it seems to suck all light in like a black hole. The Dark Thing likes to hide in the shadows and attack unsuspecting prey at will.

mobs.keywords: ranger tall mysteriously cloaked figure elf
mobs.long_desc: A tall ranger peers at you from under his hood.
mobs.desc: A tall, slender elf leans gently on the cemetery entrance.  A dark green cloak gracefully drapes to his ankles.  A handcrafted longbow is slung over his shoulder.  There are glowing runes covering the length of the great weapon. The ranger makes no attempt to hide an elven holy symbol that hangs around his neck from a thin, silver cord of silk.  His facial expression is solemn as he surveys the area.

objects.ground: A small dark key lies here on the ground.

extras.text: This key is quite old, and tarnished from age.  It is blackish in color, and appears to be unused for quite a long time.  This key once belonged to the caretaker, but is now under the control the Undead Lord.

objects.ground: You see a bright blade lying here on the ground.

extras.text: This blade shines with a bright light whenever it is in the presence of something or someone good.  It is used by the Undead Lord to protect his mausoleum and afterlife.  Being so white it is difficult to perceive exactly where the edges are, so I'd be careful with it.

objects.ground: A robe lies here on the ground in a clump.

extras.text: This robe literally emanates power as you hold it in your hands.  It once belonged to the great lich Kryzanthor.  No wonder he had so much power!  Any undead that had its hands on this thing would be a tough force to beat.

objects.ground: A bracelet lies here shimmering in and out of view.

extras.text: As you look at the bracelet, you begin to wonder if it is really there.  It seems to shimmer in and out of view, as if it couldn't decide which plane it wants to be in.  All you know is that you like it.

objects.ground: A pair of black bracers lie against the wall.

extras.text: You peer into the bracers, and you can only see the silhouette of them in the midday sun.  All light is shadowed out by them, and you can see how they could be quite useful on your arms.

objects.ground: A small circlet lies here glittering in the sunlight.

extras.text: As you look at the small circlet you are awestruck by its beauty.  It sparkles in the sunlight and must be worth at least a million bucks.  The circlet emanates a power of good, one that you wouldn't mind having for yourself.

objects.ground: The Blade of Dishonour lies here forsaken.

extras.text: This blade is extremely evil, and was used by the death knight to guard his loyal master Kryzanthor.  This sword used to be the knight's trusty long sword in his past life, but was soon corrupted for the evil ways of the death knight.

objects.ground: A sharp dragon's claw sits here.

extras.text: This is claw is undeniably sharp as you feel in the palm of your hand.  It is sharp enough to cut through almost any armor, and you fear the beast that once had possession of this.  Anyone who does not own the claw fears of it, for it means a source of protection against foes.

objects.ground: A key covered in oil sits here on the ground.

extras.text: This key is covered in oil, as if it were used in an over-oiled lock.  You realize that the oil is old and crude, meaning it hasn't been used in quite a while.

objects.ground: The North Key sits here on the ground.

extras.text: You are looking at the key obtained from the northern sector of the tunnels of Kryzanthor.  Now only if you could remember where the door is......

objects.ground: The Eastern Key sits here on the ground.

extras.text: This is the key obtained from the eastern sector of the tunnels of Kryzanthor the necromancer.  Now only if you could find the door it went to......

objects.ground: The West Key sits here on the ground.

extras.text: This is the key obtained from the western sector of the tunnels of Kryzanthor the necromancer.  Now only if you knew which door it went to......

objects.ground: The South Key sits here on the ground.

extras.text: This is the key obtained from the southern sector of the tunnels of Kryzanthor the necromancer.  Now only if you could remember which door it went to.....

objects.ground: A large iron key lies here in the dust.

extras.text: This key looks as if it has never been used before, meaning that the necromancer could never find which door it went to.  It is just an ordinary steel key from the old years.

objects.ground: A heavy leather belt is here hanging on a tree.

extras.text: You are looking at the belt of some unfortunate human that was killed. Through the transformation of life to undead, this belt has gained some power. It is 3 feet in length, and 2 inches wide.

objects.ground: A key made of bone sits here on the ground.

extras.text: This key is carved from a human bone, and it makes you shudder to think why it was made of bone, and not some better material.  This is not your ordinary skeleton key though, because it is only meant for one door, and one door only.

objects.ground: A small forsaken lantern lies here in the bushes.

extras.text: This lantern glows a pale green light that makes you chill all over.  It is a permanent light source, originating from the world of the undead.  How it got here, no one knows.

objects.short: the Ethereal Ring of the Undead
objects.ground: A glowing ring lies hidden in the dust on the ground.

extras.text: This ring was forged from the power of the Undead.  Feeling somewhat like the undead as you wear the ring, you become slower in your movements, slightly enraged, and you feel yourself slipping into the ethereal realm....

objects.ground: A broken wedding ring sits comfortably in the dirt.

extras.text: This ring is cracked on the side, probably from years and years of existance. At one time it may have been quite valuable, but now it only holds its sentimental value to its owner.

objects.ground: An ornate lamp rests here on a coffee table illuminating the room.

extras.text: This lamp looks to be centuries old and protected by some form of magic for it cannot be destroyed.  It's purpose is to provide illumination to this strange hallway.

objects.ground: A small key is hidden in the dust.

triggers.name: banshee_shriek_greet
triggers.commands: if %actor.level% < 100 wait 4 msend %actor% %self.name% shrieks in utter &3&bterror&0 at your entrance! mechoaround %actor% %self.name% shrieks in utter &3&bterror&0 as %actor.name% enters! endif

triggers.name: spectral-wife_receive
triggers.commands: * this is a comment if %object.vnum% == 47019 If %actor.vnum% == -1 if %actor.level% > 99 wait 1 msend %actor% %self.name% says, '&3&bSilly immortal, tricks are for kids!&0' give broken-wedding-ring %actor.name% else wait 1 mecho %self.name% says, '&3&bOh my poor husband!  What have you done to him?!?&0' remove ethereal-ring-undead unlock door south open door south mechoabout %actor% %self.name% rears back in rage and %actor.name% stumbles towards the south! msend %actor% %self.name% rears back in rage and you stumble towards the south! mforce %actor% south stand south close door north lock door north close folding-doors east wear ethereal-ring-undead mecho %self.name% screams in tremendous rage, '&3&bI will avenge my husband's death!!&0' kill %actor.name% end else end else end

triggers.name: spectral-wife_greet
triggers.commands: wait 1 msend %actor% %self.name% says to you, '&3&bGood day my friend.  It is not often I see' msend %actor% '&3&bcity folk in these parts.  Won't you stay and talk?&0'

triggers.name: GY_newbie_guard
triggers.commands: if %actor.vnum% == -1 if %actor.level% < 30 return 1 msend %actor% %self.name% places a hand in front of you. mechoaround %actor% %self.name% places a hand up in front of %actor.name%. whisper %actor.name% Hold on there!  South of here is terribly dangerous for someone of your skill. wait 1s whisper %actor.name% I suggest adventuring elsewhere for now. bow %actor.name% else return 0 endif else return 0 endif

rooms.name: Entrance to the Graveyard
rooms.description: You are standing at the entrance to a dark cemetery, which lies before you to the south.  The path you are standing on leads south from here where it splits into three more paths.  Thick green hedges flank both sides of the path. As your eyes adjust to the dim light, you begin to notice that a lot of the graves are upturned, and it seems that all order that may have been here at one time is now given way to an evil power.

North.description: You see a path leaving the graveyard to the north.

South.description: You see a dim-lit path to the south.

extras.text: The hedges to the west seem to be concealing something.....

rooms.name: Dark Path
rooms.description: You are now deep within the small grove.  You try to look around, but everything seems devoid of shape and color.  You can turn back east, or push on the west.  A deep sense of evil seems to come from the west, and you hope that whatever is there will leave you alone.

East.description: It is too dark to see east.

West.description: It is too dark to see west, but you feel a great evil coming from there.

rooms.name: Bend in the Path
rooms.description: As you move deeper into this small grove, you begin to wonder how a place could be so devoid of light.  As you look around you realize that you are totally surrounded by high hedges......  Including the ceiling.  Only those who have a surmountable amount of courage would be brave enough to venture on. This path continues on to the west, or you can turn back to the south.

South.description: It is too dark to see south.

West.description: It is too dark to see west.

rooms.name: Dim Path South of the Entrance
rooms.description: You are now standing just south of the entrance to the graveyard on a dimly lit path.  There are high hedges on both sides of you forcing you to go either north or south.  It appears as if you will be safe if you stay on the main path.  The entire graveyard lies before you to the south, and it emanates an unseen power of evil.

North.description: You see the entrance to the graveyard.

South.description: You see a path intersection to the south.

rooms.name: Bend in the Path
rooms.description: You are standing at a bend in the path just east of the main path.  As you move deeper into this grove, everything seems to absorb the light, and an ominous feeling pervades your being.  Your immediate reaction to turn back, but you summon the courage to stay.  The grove continues to the north.

North.description: It is too dark to see north.

East.description: You see a path intersection to your east.

rooms.name: Dim Path Intersection
rooms.description: You are at an intersection of paths that leads all directions.  Towards the east you see the entrance to the eastern sector of the graveyard.  The path south leads to a peaceful glade of graves, possibly the only safe area in this wretched place.  Yet another path leads to the west, but it is too dark to determine anything about it from where you are standing.

North.description: You see a Dim Path to your north.

East.description: You see a Dim Path to your east.

South.description: You see a dim-lit path to the south.

West.description: It is too dark there to determine anything about it.

rooms.name: Dim Path
rooms.description: You are now standing just east of the main path to the graveyard.  It seems dimly lit here, yet you sense evil creeping through the shadows.  You are surrounded by tall hedges on the north and south, and you begin to wonder what could be on the other side of them.  To the east you see a bend in the path that leads to the eastern sector of the graveyard.

East.description: You see a bend leading to the eastern sector of the graveyard.

West.description: You see a path intersection to the west.

rooms.name: Rough Bend in the Path
rooms.description: You are standing just north of the entrance to the eastern sector of the graveyard.  A cold wind is blowing from the south, and it causes a shudder to run through your body.  A little ways to the west you can see a dim light from the main path, or you can go south to the graves.

South.description: You see the entrance to the eastern sector of the graveyard.

West.description: You see a dim-lit path to your west.

rooms.name: NorthWest Graveyard
rooms.description: You are standing in the north-western sector of the graveyard.  For some reason though, you feel extremely disoriented and don't know which way is which.  You hope that you can get out of here alive.  Not only are you lost, but you see shapes of undead moving from upturned grave to upturned grave. Some sort of magic must be involved with this section of the graveyard.

North.description: Looking north you become even more disoriented.

West.description: Looking west you become even more disoriented.

rooms.name: NorthWest Graveyard
rooms.description: You are standing in the north-western sector of the graveyard.  For some reason though, you feel extremely disoriented and don't know which way is which.  You hope that you can get out of here alive.  Not only are you lost, but you see shapes of undead moving from upturned grave to upturned grave. Some sort of magic must be involved with this section of the graveyard.

North.description: Looking north you become even more disoriented.

East.description: Looking east you become even more disoriented.

West.description: Looking west you become even more disoriented.

rooms.name: NorthWest Graveyard
rooms.description: You are standing in the north-western sector of the graveyard.  For some reason though, you feel extremely disoriented and don't know which way is which.  You hope that you can get out of here alive.  Not only are you lost, but you see shapes of undead moving from upturned grave to upturned grave. Some sort of magic must be involved with this section of the graveyard.

North.description: Looking north you become even more disoriented.

East.description: Looking east you become even more disoriented.

rooms.name: Dim Path
rooms.description: You are standing a ways to the south of the entrance to the graveyard.  The path you are on is dimly lit by some unknown luminescence.  To the south you see the north-western sector of the graveyard.  It seems as if this path is one of the only safe areas to rest on.  Value it while you can.

North.description: To the north you see an intersection with paths leading off in every direction.

South.description: You see a dark path to your south.

rooms.name: Under the Mausoleum
rooms.description: You are standing just below the mausoleum in a chamber used as a precaution, such that if the person were accidentally buried alive, he/she would be able to escape.  This room is rather well furnished and stocked with life necessities. A rather large portrait of a man hangs on one of the walls.  You assume that the picture is of the man who was once buried above.  As you look around, you sense that you may not be alone in this room.

Up.description: You see the underside of what looks to be a coffin.

rooms.name: Entrance to the Eastern Sector of the Graveyard
rooms.description: As you look about you to the south, you see multiple untended graves.  You begin to wonder what has happened here.  It seems that the caretaker, if there ever was one, has abandoned his duties.  In the center of the graveyard, you see a large mausoleum surrounded by smaller graves.  Your stomach begins to churn as you smell the odor of rotting flesh.

North.description: You see a bend in the path to your north.

East.description: The northern wall of the cemetary stretches off to your east.

South.description: The western wall of the cemetary stretches off to your south.

rooms.name: North Wall
rooms.description: You are standing immediately east of the entrance to this sector of the graveyard.  A large cast-iron fence looms before you, and you shudder even at its cold touch.  A number graves are here, few of which are intact.  You fear that whatever was buried is no longer there.  The gate continues to the east, while an open area of graves lies before you to the south.

East.description: The northern wall of the graveyard stretches off to your east.

South.description: Unturned graves and shapes shifting in the dark fill the area to the south.

West.description: The entrance to this sector of the graveyard is immediately to your west.

rooms.name: North Wall
rooms.description: You are a little ways north of the entrance to the mausoleum.  The way to the north is blocked off by a menacing gate, that gives off a sense of fear. To the west you can see the entrance to the graveyard.  You think about turning back, but you are compelled to stay by some unseen force.

East.description: The northern wall of the graveyard stretches off to the east.

South.description: Looking to the south you take notice of the entrance to a mausoleum.

West.description: The northern wall continues to the west.

rooms.name: North Wall
rooms.description: You are standing at the eastern part of the north wall.  The gate turns here such that it blocks your way to the north and east.  To the south you can see many upturned graves and shapes moving in the dark.  Never have you been so aware of how dark and lonely a cemetery can be.  The gate continues to the west from here.

South.description: You see more upturned graves to the south.

West.description: The northern wall continues to the west.

rooms.name: NorthWest Graveyard
rooms.description: You are standing in the north-western sector of the graveyard.  For some reason though, you feel extremely disoriented and don't know which way is which.  You hope that you can get out of here alive.  Not only are you lost, but you see shapes of undead moving from upturned grave to upturned grave. Some sort of magic must be involved with this section of the graveyard.

North.description: Looking north you become even more disoriented.

South.description: Looking south you become even more disoriented.

West.description: Looking west you become even more disoriented.

rooms.name: Center of the NorthWest Graveyard
rooms.description: You are standing in the north-western sector of the graveyard.  For some reason though, you feel extremely disoriented and don't know which way is which.  You hope that you can get out of here alive.  Not only are you lost, but you see shapes of undead moving from upturned grave to upturned grave. Some sort of magic must be involved with this section of the graveyard.

North.description: Looking north you become even more disoriented.

East.description: Looking east you become even more disoriented.

South.description: Looking south you become even more disoriented.

West.description: Looking west you become even more disoriented.

rooms.name: NorthWest Graveyard
rooms.description: You are standing in the north-western sector of the graveyard.  For some reason though, you feel extremely disoriented and don't know which way is which.  You hope that you can get out of here alive.  Not only are you lost, but you see shapes of undead moving from upturned grave to upturned grave. Some sort of magic must be involved with this section of the graveyard.

North.description: Looking north you become even more disoriented.

East.description: Looking east you become even more disoriented.

South.description: Looking south you become even more disoriented.

rooms.name: Dark Path
rooms.description: As you move south from the entrance of the graveyard, the path begins to darken as if some evil force or cloud was overshadowing it.  This place gives you the creeps, and makes chills go up your spine.  As you look around, you see the north-western sector of the graveyard to your south, or you can go back north to the entrance of the graveyard.

North.description: You see a dim path to your north.

South.description: The dark path continues to the south.

rooms.name: West Wall
rooms.description: You are standing immediately south of the entrance of the eastern sector to the graveyard.  A few upturned graves lie here, and you begin to get an uneasy feeling.  A sense of evil comes from a larger group of graves situated to your east, and a gate shuts off any chance of movement to the west.

North.description: The entrance to this sector of the graveyard is to the north.

East.description: You see upturned graves and shapes moving in the shadows.

South.description: The western wall continues to the south.

rooms.name: Graveyard
rooms.description: You are now full surrounded by upturned graves from which a putrid smell arises.  The smell makes you want to reel and turn back, but you decide to stay and tough it out.  You just wish that you were back home in your nice soft bed, rather than fighting for your life against things that have no life!

North.description: You see a black iron gate encasing the graveyard to your north.

East.description: You see upturned graves and shapes shifting in the shadows.

South.description: You see upturned graves and shapes shifting in the shadows.

West.description: You see a black iron gate encasing the graveyard to your west.

rooms.name: Graveyard
rooms.description: You are standing directly north of the entrance to the mausoleum.  Darkness seems to pervade this entire area, and fear creeps up and down your back.  As you look about your feet, you notice a lot of broken graves and the soil has been greatly disrupted.  You are hoping that that does not mean what you think it means.

North.description: You see the northern wall to your north.

East.description: You see upturned graves and shapes shifting in the shadows.

South.description: The entrance to the mausoleum is directly to the south.

West.description: You see upturned graves and shapes shifting in the shadows.

rooms.name: Graveyard
rooms.description: You are at the north-east part of the graveyard.  The wall is just north and east of you, and you can continue on into the graveyard both west and south. Fear is growing in your mind.  Dark shapes are moving all about you, and you know that they are just a little more than roaming animals.  You had better watch out!

North.description: You see the northern wall.

East.description: You see the eastern wall.

South.description: You see upturned graves and shapes shifting in the shadows.

West.description: You see upturned graves and shapes shifting in the shadows.

rooms.name: East Wall
rooms.description: You are now standing at the north corner of the east wall.  The large gate prevents any movement to the east or north.  Everything around you seems to emanate a sense of evil, and you feel quite uneasy.  You can go south along the east wall, or west to more upturned graves.

South.description: The eastern wall continues to the south.

West.description: You see upturned graves and shapes shifting in the shadows.

rooms.name: NorthWest Graveyard
rooms.description: You are standing in the north-western sector of the graveyard.  For some reason though, you feel extremely disoriented and don't know which way is which.  You hope that you can get out of here alive.  Not only are you lost, but you see shapes of undead moving from upturned grave to upturned grave. Some sort of magic must be involved with this section of the graveyard.

South.description: Looking south you become even more disoriented.

West.description: Looking west you become even more disoriented.

rooms.name: NorthWest Graveyard
rooms.description: You are standing in the north-western sector of the graveyard.  For some reason though, you feel extremely disoriented and don't know which way is which.  You hope that you can get out of here alive.  Not only are you lost, but you see shapes of undead moving from upturned grave to upturned grave. Some sort of magic must be involved with this section of the graveyard.

East.description: Looking east you become even more disoriented.

South.description: Looking south you become even more disoriented.

West.description: Looking west you become even more disoriented.

rooms.name: NorthWest Graveyard
rooms.description: You are standing in the north-western sector of the graveyard.  For some reason though, you feel extremely disoriented and don't know which way is which.  You hope that you can get out of here alive.  Not only are you lost, but you see shapes of undead moving from upturned grave to upturned grave. Some sort of magic must be involved with this section of the graveyard.

East.description: Looking east you become even more disoriented.

South.description: Looking south you become even more disoriented.

West.description: Looking west you become even more disoriented.

rooms.name: Bend in the Dark Path
rooms.description: You are standing on a bend in the path leading to the north-western sector of the graveyard.  It appears as if this entire area were shrouded by some evil force that you would rather not know about.  The path is getting increasingly darker, and fear starts to develop in your being.  Directly to the west is the graveyard, and the path also continues north out of this wretched place.

North.description: You see a dark path leading to the entrance to the graveyard.

West.description: You see the northwest sector of the graveyard.

rooms.name: West Wall
rooms.description: You are standing a ways east of the mausoleum.  Everywhere you look, graves have been upturned, and you wonder what could have been responsible for this. You truly hope that whatever or whoever is responsible does not intend to make you a permanent part of it.  You can go in any direction but west, which is blocked off by a large cast-iron gate.

North.description: The western wall continues to the north.

East.description: You see the mausoleum a ways to your east.

South.description: The western wall continues to the south.

rooms.name: Graveyard
rooms.description: You are now standing directly west of the eastern wall of the mausoleum. Graves are everywhere....  What did you expect?  You are in a graveyard.  What you didn't expect though, is that many are broken, and you see dark shapes moving through from grave to grave.  You hope that whatever they are they'll leave you alone.

North.description: You cringe in terror as yet more shapes move in the darkness.

South.description: Shapes are moving from grave to grave and you tighten your grip on your weapon.

West.description: Then western wall of the graveyard is to your west.

rooms.name: Mausoleum
rooms.description: You are now standing inside of a quite large burial chamber.  It seems that whoever was buried in here was quite well-off, for these type of burial arrangements are not cheap.  The room is quite drab though, except for the actual burial coffin at the end of the room.  The layer of dust on it hints that this place has been undisturbed for quite a long time.  You are quite intrigued by a soft glow coming from under the lid of the coffin.

North.description: Looking out of the mausoleum you see the shapes moving in the darkness.

Down.description: You see a coffin with a soft glow coming from under its lid.

rooms.name: Graveyard
rooms.description: You are standing next to the eastern wall of the mausoleum.  It is made of brick, but it is too dark to discern anything else about it.  Graves are positioned about you, and you feel nauseous from the horrible stench.  You begin to wonder if this is really worth it.  You can go north and south in the graveyard, or east to the wall.

North.description: You cringe in terror as yet more shapes move in the darkness.

East.description: The eastern wall of the graveyard lies east of here.

South.description: Peering south you feel a tap on your shoulder, only to turn around and see nothing.  Returning your gaze southward you see more of the same -- upturned graves and shapes moving in the darkness.

rooms.name: East Wall
rooms.description: You are standing a little ways west of the east wall of the mausoleum. Passage is blocked to the east by an overpowering cast-iron gate.  You shudder even at the thought of touching it.  As you look around, you notice that this place is crawling with undead.  You can go in any direction except east.

North.description: The eastern wall continues to the north.

South.description: The eastern wall continues to the south.

West.description: You see the mausoleum a ways to the west.

rooms.name: West Wall
rooms.description: You are now standing at the southern corner of the West Wall, which is blocked off to the west and south by the gate.  Fear creeps up and down your spine as you walk deeper into the graveyard.  Far to the north you can see a faint light where you remember the entrance of this wretched place to be, and more upturned graves lie to the east.

North.description: The western wall continues to the north.

East.description: You cringe in terror as yet more shapes move in the darkness.

rooms.name: Graveyard
rooms.description: You are at the south-west part of the graveyard, just north and east of the surrounding gate.  Open graves are strewn about you and you are forced to hold your stomach from the incredible stench.  You wonder if it is really worth it to be here.  The more you look around, the more fear grows in your mind as to whether you'll make it out alive.

North.description: The gravestones look to be upturned as you peer to the north.

East.description: You hear distant moans of the undead coming from the east.

South.description: The southern wall is directly to your south.

West.description: You cringe in terror as yet more shapes move in the darkness.

rooms.name: Graveyard
rooms.description: You are standing directly south of a large mausoleum.  It's brick face is just about all that you can perceive about it, for it seems to be masked in some sort of darkness.  You sense evil all around you, and you are quite proud of yourself that you actually have the courage to stay here.

East.description: Shapes are moving from grave to grave and you tighten your grip on your weapon.

South.description: You see the southern wall of the graveyard.

West.description: You see upturned graves and shapes shifting in the shadows.

rooms.name: Graveyard
rooms.description: You are at the south-east part of the graveyard.  To your east and south you can see a great cast-iron fence that makes you cower back.  This stench the comes from the graves is really starting to get to you.  You wonder what could possibly cause such a horrific smell.  Your question is answered as you notice shapes of the undead moving through the darkness.

North.description: Peering north you feel a tap on your shoulder, only to turn around and see nothing.  Returning your gaze northward you see more of the same -- upturned graves and shapes moving in the darkness.

East.description: You see the western wall of the graveyard.

South.description: You see the southern wall of the graveyard.

West.description: You cringe in terror as yet more shapes move in the darkness.

rooms.name: East Wall
rooms.description: You are standing at the southern corner of the east wall.  The gate looms above you to the east and south.  Upturned graves lie all around you, and you don't see any sign of whatever was buried there.  You are quite curious as to what has the power to do all of this.  You can go either north along the east wall, or west into the center of the graveyard.

North.description: The eastern wall continues to the north.

West.description: Shapes are moving from grave to grave and you tighten your grip on your weapon.

rooms.name: Graveyard (NW)
rooms.description: You are now standing in the north-west corner of the graveyard, and it seems that the closer you get to the mausoleum, the stronger you are compelled away. You return to your familiar thoughts of what could have done this.  You remember the diary and the part about the evil wizard, and have a suspicion that a lich be could responsible for all of this.  If that is true, you have a tough fight ahead of you.

East.description: The graveyard continues to the east.

South.description: You see the undead moving from grave to grave as you peer to the south.

rooms.name: Graveyard (N)
rooms.description: You are now standing directly north of the mausoleum, and a strong cold wind seems to flow out of it.  You wonder how this is possible, but you would rather not know.  A strong sense of evil is coming from directly south, yet you stand strong and go on.  The mausoleum seems to be charred and broken, as if no one has tended it for years.  You can enter the mausoleum to the south, or go back to the north-west corner of the graveyard.

South.description: The entrance to a mausoleum lies directly to the south.

West.description: The graveyard continues to the west.

rooms.name: South Wall
rooms.description: As you look around you begin to realize the setup of this part of the graveyard.  You are at the south-west corner of the wall, from which you can go either north or east.  The gate blocks your way to the south and and west. Even though you are starting to familiarize yourself with this place, it does not make the fear of the moving shapes in the dark lessen.

North.description: Shapes are moving from grave to grave and you tighten your grip on your weapon.

East.description: The southern wall continues to the east.

rooms.name: South Wall
rooms.description: You are standing a little ways south of back wall of the mausoleum.  Graves surround you in every direction except south, where the great gate seems to shrink down to the size of a door.  In fact, you notice a small keyhole in the gate.  From what you can see, you can go east and west along the gate, or north to the graveyard.

North.description: You see the mausoleum in the distance.

East.description: The southern wall continues to the east.

South.description: You see a small door standing in the face of the gate.

West.description: The southern wall continues to the west.

rooms.name: South Wall
rooms.description: You are standing in the south-east corner of the graveyard, next to the great gate.  It blocks your passage to both the east and the south, but you can see an area of graves to you north.  The uneasiness that you feel is starting to grow as shapes move from grave to grave.

North.description: Shapes are moving from grave to grave and you tighten your grip on your weapon.

West.description: The southern wall continues to the west.

rooms.name: Graveyard (W)
rooms.description: You are now standing in the western part of the graveyard, directly next to the west wall of the mausoleum.  The feeling of uneasiness that is covering you like a blanket does seem to be leaving.  The undead are moving all around you, and you have never felt more alert before in your life.  The graveyard continues to the north and south.

North.description: The graveyard stretches out further to the north.

South.description: The graveyard continues to the south.

rooms.name: Mausoleum
rooms.description: You are standing within a great burial chamber for what looks to be a quite wealthy person.  The mausoleum is furnished in the style of the ancient days. You look about you and notice an overturned coffin at the back of the room. The contents of the coffin have been long since decayed.  The entire place has been looted of any worth.  Where the coffin used to sit, you notice a small latch on the floor.  Upon closer examination, you discover a trapdoor leading downwards.

North.description: Peering out the mausoleum you see shapes moving around the graveyard.

Down.description: You see a trapdoor where the coffin used to be.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: You are standing in a forsaken, yet attractive bathroom.  The caretaker took good care of it when he was alive, but it has since then decayed.  The vanity seems to be in good shape, and the mirror is uncracked.  You look in the mirror and see the face of someone who has had better days.  It looks as if the only exit from this room is back the way you came.

East.description: You see the hallway.

rooms.name: Upstairs Hallway
rooms.description: You are standing at the end of the upstairs hallway.  To the west you see a bathroom, which is also well arranged, and everything seems untouched.  The room to your east seems to pulsate with a strange light.  Maybe answers to a lot of questions about this place could be answered by what is in that room. You can also go back south down the hallway.

East.description: You see the caretaker's bedroom to the east.

South.description: The hallway continues to the south.

West.description: You see a small bathroom.

rooms.name: Caretaker's Bedroom
rooms.description: You walk into the caretaker's bedroom and you discover the source of the illumination that was earlier seen.  The corpse of the caretaker lies here broken at the foot of the bed, glowing with a strange light.  You discover a diary on the desk and find out that an evil magician took over the graveyard, and paid off the caretaker with a large amounts of money to stay put in his house and be quiet.  Towards the end of the diary, the caretaker appears to have disobeyed this pact in some way, and was fearing for his life.  The outcome now lies before you as a corpse next to the bed.

West.description: You see the hallway.

rooms.name: Dark Hidden Tunnel Passage
rooms.description: You are now in a hidden passage just south of the eastern sector of the graveyard.  As the gate shuts behind you, an incredibly feeling of loneliness fills your soul.  You are glad that you brought an adequate light source, for this place seems to be totally devoid of light.  As your eyes adjust to the lack of light, you see that you are in a tunnel leading south.

North.description: You see a sturdy door in the center of the gate.

South.description: The dark tunnel continues to the south.

rooms.name: Graveyard (SW)
rooms.description: You are standing in the south-west corner of the graveyard.  It seems as if this sector is much smaller than the eastern one.  Fear begins to climb into your soul as you look upon the undead bodies strewn about.  The smell is making you nauseous, and you have a strong compulsion to turn back.  The graveyard continues to the north and east.

North.description: You see shapes moving from grave to grave as you peer north into the graveyard.

East.description: You see the entrance to this sector of the graveyard.

rooms.name: Graveyard (S)
rooms.description: You are now standing directly north of the entrance to the graveyard.  You look about you, and you notice that the graves here are upturned, and reek of rotting human flesh.  You also notice shapes moving in the dark about the graveyard, and you hear moaning and screams.  Directly to your north you see the wall of another mausoleum.

South.description: You see the gate to the graveyard.

West.description: The graveyard continues to the west.

rooms.name: West Storage Room
rooms.description: You are standing in a small storage room just west of the upstairs hallway. Small odds and ends lay scattered about in boxes that haven't been touched in years.  It seems that the caretaker was quite a pack-rat.  Among the things scattered about you, you find nothing of use.  The only exit from this room is back into the hallway.

East.description: You see the hallway.

rooms.name: Upstairs Hallway
rooms.description: It appears as if this hallway has not been touched for years by anything living.  You sense a strong presence of something here though, and you can't help wondering what the source of the light coming from the end of the hall is. To both the east and west are storage rooms, filled with old haberdashery.  A noteworthy amount of dust covers everything here.  You can go south to the stairwell, or north towards the end of this hallway.

North.description: You look down the hallway and see two doors facing eachother in the east and west walls.

East.description: You see a dusty storage room.

South.description: You see the top of the ornate staircase.

West.description: You see a dusty storage room.

rooms.name: East Storage Room
rooms.description: This room seems to be one big dust ball.  Everything is covered with a great amount of dust, and it is quite disgusting.  It is very obvious that this place has been undisturbed for quite a long time.  You search about the things and discover that most of the things are old haberdashery and house fittings.  The only exit out of this room is west where you came from.

West.description: You see the hallway.

rooms.name: Hidden Tunnel Passageway
rooms.description: You are standing in a tunnel with little light, yet enough to be able to see.  The walls of the tunnel are quite smooth, and you notice a part of the wall to the south with small cracks in it, as if a door were there.  As you look in the corners of this room you notice a few skeletons, and you hope that you don't get trapped in this place like them.

North.description: The dark tunnel passageway continues to the north.

South.description: You see a small door in the face of the wall.

rooms.name: Outside the West Sector Gate
rooms.description: You are standing just outside the gate to the western sector of the graveyard.  For once in a long time, you are standing under sunshine, and the problems of the world seem to melt away.  You are quickly reminded of your dilemma though as you look north into total darkness.  You can go north into the cemetery or back down below the gate.

North.description: The gate lies to your north.

Down.description: You see a small trapdoor in the ground.

rooms.name: Entrance to the Western Sector of the Graveyard
rooms.description: You are now standing at the entrance to the western sector of the graveyard, just north of the gate.  This part of the graveyard seems to remind you a lot of the eastern sector.  You feel a much deeper sense of evil though than before.  The smell of the undead abounds as you enter this horrific place. You can go north into the graveyard, or south outside the gate.

North.description: You look north to see more death and decay.

South.description: The gate to the graveyard is to your south.

rooms.name: Top of the Furnished Staircase
rooms.description: You are standing at the top of a beautiful staircase in front of a hallway leading north.  As you look down the hallway, you notice a light coming from the second door on the left.  This is really intriguing you, and you are dead curious as to who or what is living here.  The other rooms off of the hallway seem dark and dead, as if unentered for years.

North.description: You peer down the hallway and see a number of doors.

Down.description: The staircase leads down to the first level of the house.

rooms.name: Furnished Hallway
rooms.description: You are standing in a hallway directly west of the entrance to this fine house.  The walls are adorned with beautiful pictures of nature.  As you feel yourself getting lost in the pictures, you begin to feel at peace again.  To the south you can see a lavish dining room, and to the east the foyer.

East.description: You see the entrance to the caretaker's house.

South.description: You see the dining room.

rooms.name: Foyer to the Caretaker's House
rooms.description: You are now standing in the entrance to the caretaker's house.  It seems as if this place has been tended to, yet you wonder how, because the graveyard sure hasn't.  You are curious what happened to the caretaker.....  Maybe you'll find out soon enough.  This place is quite a change of pace from the graveyard itself.  The smell is quite pleasant, almost dreamy, and everything seems well furnished.  To the east and west you see small hallways leading to the living and dining room.  Down a hallway to the south you can make out a stairwell leading to a second level.

North.description: You see the front door of the caretaker's house to your north.

East.description: You see a small hallway leading to the living room.

South.description: Peering to the south you take notice of a well-decorated hallway leading to the second level of the caretaker's house.

West.description: You see a small hallway that leads to the dining room.

rooms.name: Furnished Hallway
rooms.description: You are now standing in a hallway directly east of the entrance to the caretaker's house.  There is a bay-window in the east-wall of the hallway, and it provides you with a breath-taking view looking over a glade.  You could just sit here and look out this windows all day long.  To the south you see a well furnished living room, and the foyer is to the west.

South.description: Looking south you see a well furnished living room.

West.description: You see the fawyer to the caretaker's house.

rooms.name: Under the West Sector Gate
rooms.description: You are now standing directly under the gate to the west sector of the graveyard.  Through the trapdoor in the ceiling you can see sunlight shining through.  Warmth fills your heart as the rays hit you in the face.  It seems as if this would be a safe place to rest.  The only way to go is up.

East.description: You small a small white door in the face of the wall.

Up.description: You see a small trapdoor in the ceiling.

rooms.name: Wall of Bones
rooms.description: As you come into the end of the tunnel, you are amazed at a mighty wall of human skulls.  The wall stretches from the roof of the tunnel down to the floor leaving absolutely no cracks.  Not even light shines through.  It seems as if some magical power is holding the wall up, for you cannot force it down.  You are very curious as to what or who could be doing this.  You look around a see a small door in the middle of the wall.  It looks as if the only way through, is through that door.

East.description: A dark tunnel passageway stretches off to the east.

West.description: You see a small door made of bones set in the lower right part of the wall.

rooms.name: Dark Tunnel Passageway
rooms.description: As you move deeper into the tunnels, your curiosity grows and pushes you to move on.  The walls are very moist and you can feel crawling insects below your feet.  You can hear water trickling on the walls, and wonder if this nightmare will ever end.  You feel a deep sense of evil and power coming from the west.

East.description: The tunnel continues to the east.

West.description: You see the Wall of Bones to your west.

rooms.name: Darker Tunnel Passageway
rooms.description: This is the east-west section of the tunnel underneath the caretaker's house.  Where is this leading you to?  Obviously the caretaker had some use for this when he was alive, but who knows what has happened to it since his death. Even as you walk deeper into this tunnel you feel the darkness creeping into your soul, and you begin to fear for your life.

East.description: You see the end of the dark tunnel passageway a ways to your east.

West.description: The dark tunnel passageway continues to the west.  You see shapes moving in the dark.

rooms.name: Dark Tunnel Passageway
rooms.description: This east-west section of the tunnel is surprisingly dark, and it takes a while for your eyes to adjust.  As you get used to the lack of light, you once again notice shapes moving in the shadows.  You pray that they are only rats, and not the undead.  The overall aura of the tunnel is getting progressively worse as you move west.  You can continue going west, or turn back towards the house.

East.description: You see the end of the tunnel passageway to the east.

West.description: The dark tunnel passageway stretches off to the west.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: You are standing in an incredibly lavish dining room filled with cabinets of fine china.  You begin to wonder how a caretaker who must have led a humble life could have afforded all of this.  Is it possible that he was paid off to mind his own business?  You can't help wondering how all this could have happened.  There is something about the carpet though that seems uneven.

North.description: You see a small hallway to your north.

Down.description: You see something that looks like a trapdoor.

rooms.name: Downstairs Hallway
rooms.description: You are standing in a hallway just south of the entrance to the caretaker's house.  This place seems to follow the pattern of everywhere else.  It also is perfectly arranged, as if the caretaker had a lot of time on his hands.  The walls here are also adorned with beautiful pictures.  To the south you see a staircase leading to the second story.

North.description: You see the fawyer.

South.description: Looking south you see a staircase leading to the second story.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: You walk into a room fully furnished with every type of social fitting. Couches line the walls, and other small recliners are in the corners of the room.  Also, an ornate coffee table sits in the middle of the room.  You wonder why a caretaker would need all of this.....  Maybe he had visitors often.  To the north you see the hallway.

North.description: You see a quaint hallway to the north.

rooms.name: Under the Dining Room
rooms.description: You are directly under the dining room of the caretaker.  This place is quite different than the caretaker's lavish house, for it is a dark and damp tunnel.  It seems that you have left the security of the house, and are in the same situation as when you were back in the graveyard.  Once again, you are knocked back by the familiar, yet disgusting smell of the undead.  The tunnel continues to the west.

West.description: The dark tunnel passageway stretches off to the west.

Up.description: You look up and see a small trapdoor.

rooms.name: Furnished Staircase
rooms.description: You are standing at the foot of an ornate staircase.  It's railing is carved out by what seems to be only the best of wood-carvers.  This house obviously required a great wealth to obtain.  As you look up the stairs you notice a few lights on and wonder if someone is actually still living here.

North.description: You see a hallway leading to the fawyer of the house.

Up.description: The stairway leads to the second floor.
